name: Frog Room
long_description: It's like a dream come true. On every wall - on every surface, in fact - there is a frog. It is the cutest thing in this entire mansion...even if it is extremely confusing.

oak door.short_description: An old wooden door cracked with age.
oak door.long_description: An old wooden door cracked with age. It has a silver keyhole.

marble door.short_description: A door made entirely of marble.
marble door.long_description: A door made entirely of marble. It doesn't appear to have a keyhole.

fuzzy armchair.description: A blue armchair covered in fuzz. It looks untouched.
